summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4112 for the improvement of East 51st Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue; by paving, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49343, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
